entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as a person who disappeared without any information about his whereabouts. He was previously known to have killed the Riddles and now it seems he has committed another murder for gain.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a superior of Tom Riddle who had no idea where he went. He wants to draw Harry's attention to certain points of their story.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who committed another murder for gain. He wanted Hepzibah's cup and locket.

entities.name: hepzibah
entities.description: Hepzibah is mentioned as an old woman who showed Voldemort her two fabulous trophies.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one to whom Dumbledore wants to draw attention to certain points of their story. He seems puzzled by Voldemort's actions.

relationships.description: Voldemort robbed Hepzibah of her cup and locket.
Voldemort stole his uncle Morfin's ring.
